failures.message:
tsuku collects anonymous usage statistics to improve the tool.
No personal information is collected. See: https://tsuku.dev/telemetry

To opt out: tsuku config set telemetry false
         or export TSUKU_NO_TELEMETRY=1
Error: registry: recipe tree-sitter@0.25 not found in registry

Suggestion: Verify the recipe name is correct. Run 'tsuku recipes' to list available recipes

To create a recipe from a package ecosystem:
  tsuku create tree-sitter@0.25 --from <ecosystem>

Available ecosystems: cra...

Suggestion: Verify the recipe name is correct. Run 'tsuku recipes' to list available recipes
